      • init

        public void init()
          throws JALException
        Important function.
        Before calling this function, if you need to, you have to call setForceEIDSchema(EngineForceEIDSchema) and setIPNNodeForDTN2(int).
        This function have to be called once before using BPSocket.
        In case you will not call init() the BPSocket will do it for you.
        Throws:
        JALException - See @JALException

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Important function.
        You have to call this function when you don't want to use BPSockets anymore.
